title: (Happy Path) : Case Access Administrator successfully Requests NoC to Replace a litigant's current representation - No auto-approval applies
specs: Richard - with the ability to create a case for a particular jurisdiction within an organisation
Matt - with a pui-caa role for the same jurisdiction within a different organisation from Richard
is made by Matt to place an NOC Request in order to become Mario's representative on C1
contains all correct answers in the correct format
